BatchModifyTargetWeight.document: 针对负载均衡实例(lb-dx98lwo0)， 将其监听器 lbl-4b5hnc9a 下的转发规则 loc-o8cnyw6c 所绑定的后端服务 ins-19404pl5（端口为110）权重修改为 50，以及将监听器 lbl-20jjtaaw 下的转发规则 loc-8c5pdrb8 所绑定的后端服务 ins-19411tzv（端口为80）权重修改为 30

CreateListener.document: 创建HTTPS监听器，并绑定已有证书
CreateListener.title: 创建HTTPS监听器，并绑定已有证书

CreateListener.document: 创建TCP监听器的同时设置健康检查信息
CreateListener.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateListener
<公共请求参数>

{
    "HealthCheck": {
        "UnHealthNum": "4",
        "HealthNum": "4",
        "IntervalTime": "7",
        "TimeOut": "5",
        "HealthSwitch": "1"
    },
    "Protocol": "TCP",
    "Ports": [
        "7571"
    ],
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-cuxw2rm0"
}
CreateListener.title: 创建TCP监听器的同时设置健康检查信息

CreateListener.document: 创建HTTPS监听器，并同时绑定新建的证书
CreateListener.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateListener
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Protocol": "HTTPS",
    "Ports": [
        "7573"
    ],
    "Certificate": {
        "SSLMode": "UNIDIRECTIONAL",
        "CertContent": "-----BEGINCERTIFICATE-----\\nxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx\\n-----ENDCERTIFICATE-----",
        "CertName": "my-cert",
        "CertKey": "-----BEGINRSAPRIVATEKEY-----\\nxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx\\n-----ENDRSAPRIVATEKEY-----"
    },
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-cuxw2rm0"
}
CreateListener.title: 创建HTTPS监听器，并同时绑定新建的证书

CreateListener.document: 创建UDP监听器，健康检查方式使用Ping（默认方式）
CreateListener.title: 创建UDP监听器，健康检查方式使用Ping（默认方式）

CreateListener.document: 创建两个TCP监听器，分别监听7569和7570端口，并分别命名为lis0和lis1。
CreateListener.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateListener
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ListenerNames": [
        "lis1",
        "lis0"
    ],
    "Protocol": "TCP",
    "Ports": [
        "7570",
        "7569"
    ],
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-cuxw2rm0"
}
CreateListener.title: 创建两个TCP监听器，分别监听7569和7570端口，并分别命名为lis0和lis1

CreateLoadBalancer.document: 在私有网络中创建一个公网负载均衡
CreateLoadBalancer.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLoadBalancer
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Forward": 1,
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "LoadBalancerType": "OPEN",
    "VpcId": "vpc-30xqxt9p",
    "LoadBalancerName": "test-open"
}

Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLoadBalancer
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Forward": 1,
    "SubnetId": "subnet-k57djpow",
    "LoadBalancerType": "INTERNAL",
    "VpcId": "vpc-30xqxt9p",
    "LoadBalancerName": "test_internal"
}

DescribeTaskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeTaskStatus
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": "55c85074-3e7f-4c6d-864f-673660d4f8de"
}

Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com

    "Domain": "foo.net",
    "ListenerId": "lbl-n8mb2r3a",
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-1wvl0ejw"
}

ModifyListener.title: 修改HTTPS监听器绑定的证书

ModifyListener.document: 修改TCP监听器的名称、健康检查参数及转发策略
ModifyListener.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyListener
<公共请求参数>

{
    "HealthCheck": {
        "UnHealthNum": "5",
        "HealthNum": "5",
        "IntervalTime": "60",
        "TimeOut": "35",
        "HealthSwitch": "1"
    },
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-cuxw2rm0",
    "ListenerId": "lbl-d1ubsydq",
    "ListenerName": "newlis",
    "Scheduler": "LEAST_CONN",
    "SessionExpireTime": "120"
}
ModifyListener.title: 修改TCP监听器的名称、健康检查参数及转发策略

POST / HTTP/1.1

    "LoadBalancerName": "newlbname",
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-6efswuxa"
}

ModifyTargetPort.title: 修改绑定的后端服务的端口

ModifyTargetWeight.title: 修改四层监听器上绑定的后端服务的权重

SetLoadBalancerSecurityGroups.document: 负载均衡实例原来已绑定若干个安全组，执行本操作后，所有安全组都将从此负载均衡实例解绑。
SetLoadBalancerSecurityGroups.title: 解绑所有安全组

SetLoadBalancerSecurityGroups.document: 负载均衡实例原来绑定了两个安全组： sg-0936o7sd、sg-12345678，执行本操作后，安全组 sg-12345678 将从此负载均衡实例解绑。
SetLoadBalancerSecurityGroups.title: 从负载均衡实例解绑一个安全组

SetLoadBalancerSecurityGroups.document: 负载均衡实例原来未绑定任何安全组，执行本操作后，安全组 sg-0936o7sd、sg-12345678 将被绑定至此负载均衡实例。
SetLoadBalancerSecurityGroups.title: 绑定多个安全组至负载均衡实例

SetLoadBalancerStartStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: clb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SetLoadBalancerStartStatus
<公共请求参数>

{
    "LoadBalancerId": "lb-xxxxxxxx",
    "OperationType": "Stop"
}
SetLoadBalancerStartStatus.title: 启停负载均衡实例

SetSecurityGroupForLoadbalancers.title: 绑定一个安全组至多个负载均衡
